channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15608] Remove PB references from SnapShot related Exceptions
item.description: This is a sub-task for HBASE-15174.
item.summary: Remove PB references from SnapShot related Exceptions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Patch that updates all the SnapshotRelated Exception to work with the POJO SnapshotDescription. Once this and HBASE-15609 are committed then we are left only with HConnection.

new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.SnapshotDescription(reqSnapshot.getName(),

788	              reqSnapshot.getTable(), ProtobufUtil.createSnapshotType(reqSnapshot.getType()),

789	              reqSnapshot.getOwner(), reqSnapshot.getCreationTime(), reqSnapshot.getVersion()));

This will convert a PB SnapshotDescription into our POJO SnapshotDescription right? Can we add this in a Util method and just use that in all these places?
Like PBUtil.toSnapshotDescription(PB object)

I specifically did not do that way because we are just creating an object directly using the constructor and this usage in only in Exceptions. The other one where from a POJO we create a Protos description we have lot of builders and others, hence I thought PBUtil is fine.

-1 overall
